text: I believe it is in my nature to dance by virtue of the beat of my heart, the pulse of my blood and the music in my mind.
author: Robert Fulghum

text: By its very nature the beautiful is isolated from everything else. From beauty no road leads to reality.
author: Hannah Arendt

text: For all of nature's wonder and beauty, it is also hostile and unpredictable.
author: Liam Neeson

text: Although I'm an atheist who believes only in great nature, I recognize the spiritual richness and grandeur of the Roman Catholicism in which I was raised.
author: Camille Paglia

text: Philosophy would render us entirely Pyrrhonian, were not nature too strong for it.
author: David Hume
